title: #189: Catastrophic Alcoholic (@TheTeeb)
itunes:title: Catastrophic Alcoholic with Jayson Thibault
description: Jayson Thibault came to my AirBnB to talk about alcholism. Jayson is a drunk. He's addicted to alcohol. He was sober for almost 3 years and then he relapsed and now he can't stop drinking. So we talked about what it means to be an alcoholic. From how it started, to what it means on a day to day level, to why it continues. It's an educational experience through the eyes of an addict.
